headline: Morgan Stanley Lowers Comcast (CMCSA) Target Amid Shifts in Wireless and Fiber Outlook
summary: Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) is included among the 11 Best Low Priced Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. Morgan Stanley analyst Benjamin Swinburne on December 10 cut his price target on Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) to $31 from $32 but maintained an Equal Weight rating. He pointed out that fixed wireless net additions could pick up […]

headline: Comcast (CMCSA): Reassessing Valuation After a Prolonged Share Price Slide
summary: Comcast (CMCSA) has quietly drifted lower this year, even as its core broadband, media, and theme-park businesses remain firmly profitable. This creates an interesting setup for investors rethinking where this stock fits in their portfolios. See our latest analysis for Comcast. Those headwinds show up clearly in the numbers, with the share price now at $27.60 and a steep year to date share price return of -26.24%. The five year total shareholder return of -38.21% highlights how sentiment has...
